introduction: If you haven’t seen it yet, The Control Master is a collaboration between famed found-illustration animator, Run Wrake (creator of SOTW film, Rabbit), and the image library, Veer. Created using only CSA archive images, the story involves a secret giganticator device that allows a normal woman to increase in size and save the city from dangers. When the device falls into the wrong hands, the city is thrown into peril.
